title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.161 - Health facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.161 - Health facility

State Regulations

Any licensed facility, place or building which is
organized, maintained and operated for the diagnosis, care and treatment of
human illness, physical or mental, including convalescence and rehabilitation
and including care during and after pregnancy, or for any one or more of these
purposes, for one or more persons, to which such persons are admitted for a
24-hour stay or longer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.161

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
